name: Payment gates as a source of traffic
description: Once the payment has been through for a user, the redirection to the webpage cannot be counted as a new source of visit (session) because it is the same user that made the purchase and it would cut the session and bias the data.

blocks.description: Loads data and checks for presence of sessions by source
blocks.failMessage: No data returned for sessions by source

blocks.description: The test compares the source of referral to a list of known payment gates. If there is a match, it fails.
blocks.passMessage: There are no known payment gates among the sources of traffic
blocks.failMessage: Payment gates are source of traffic
blocks.failHowtofix: All known payment gates should be excluded using „referral exclusion list“ on property level or by GTM.
